description:
Our next meetup will be in August. It's another virtual meetup. Join us on zoom at 7pm. You'll get the link when you RSVP.

Just started learning Ruby? Thinking about starting to learn? Been writing Ruby for years? Please join us, and feel free to invite anyone who might be interested, because remember: Ruby really is awesome (https://blog.teamtreehouse.com/why-ruby-is-awesome).

== Richard Brooke ==

50 things I've always wanted to know about Ruby but was afraid to ask

This month Richard will be hosting a live Q&A! We’re collating questions in this Google Doc:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1liY8YsCTj3oGMpJ5NlwBDqHTjTSXDe438rfHwHnckwM/edit

Please feel free to edit the doc and add your questions! Richard will then organize the best person to answer each question.

We look forward to an interesting and interactive discussion!

* * *

Schedule

Join Zoom at 7pm. You'll get the link when you RSVP.

7.05pm - Richard Brooke

* * *

Slack

If you have any questions or suggestions please join us on Slack. Go to https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel

* * *

Look forward to seeing you soon!
title: South West Ruby #28 (ONLINE)
